content:
“This show is absolutely not about bad news — we do it because of the bad news” — Derek Mooney is just fizzing with enthusiasm for success stories, simple solutions and ‘getting people on board’.
And this enthusiasm ripples right through the latest s... [5479 chars]
description: Derek Mooney explains that this is "a story of hope. It celebrates the people who are trying to make a difference in the climate and biodiversity crisis. This environmental disaster can be reversed. It will take all of us to make a difference. The fight isn't over yet, but the clock is ticking".
title: Back from the Brink is back this evening with simple solutions and success stories

content:
SINGAPORE – Owners of Housing Board flats or their property agents will have the option to list and market their homes for sale directly on the HDB Flat Portal from May 13.
The latest enhancement to the portal, which aims to streamline the process of... [1100 chars]
description: The service will be free of charge for the time being, HDB said. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: Sellers can list their flats on HDB Flat Portal from May 13

content: SpaceX’s Starship rocket, a futuristic vehicle designed to eventually carry astronauts to the moon and beyond, will probably have its fourth flight in 3-5 weeks, the company’s Chief Executive Elon Musk said in a post on social media platform X on Sat... [338 chars]
description: Earlier this year, SpaceX’s Starship rocket completed nearly an entire test flight through space on its third try getting farther than ever before, but disintegrated on its return to Earth.
title: Musk sees fourth flight of SpaceX's Starship in 3-5 weeks

title: Morning briefing: Shri Badrinath Dham reopens after six months, Kejriwal to discuss LS polls with AAP leaders; & more

content: Union Minister Smriti Irani took a jibe at Congress leader Rahul Gandhi after he accepted an invitation to have a public debate with Prime Minister Narendra Modi over key election issues. She questioned if Rahul Gandhi was the INDIA bloc's prime mini... [2606 chars]

title: 'Are you PM candidate?' Smriti Irani mocks Rahul Gandhi for Modi debate bid

title: Victorian government cuts its elective surgery target by 40,000 procedures a year due to staff shortages
